review.comment_positive: Rooms were big. Staff were friendly, when we made our complaint they were helpful and understood. Gave us back our money for the night we checked out early.
review.comment_negative:
I donâ€™t know how this hotel has been given a 4-star rating! Should have read more of the reviews before we booked. Rooms were unclean, bathroom was pretty awful, shower only had freezing cold water. There was a smell in the room which is hard to describe, probably caused by people smoking in the room previously. The whole hotel is dated and needs a proper renovation. Breakfast wasnâ€™t great either.

Side note to backpackers/travellers - do not go to Vinh, cannot emphasise this enough. Itâ€™s the Luton of Vietnam. There is nothing to do there and as a westerner you are treated pretty awfully by the locals. First time we had experienced this in the month weâ€™ve been in Vietnam - shouting aggressively and swearing at us as we walked down the street minding our own business. We checked out early and left, donâ€™t stay here!
